name: Meowtroidvania
description:
Here is little prototype of my metroidvania game.
Things that are implemented right now:

  • Fully working state machine (Thanks to this vid by HeartBeat: YouTube link)
  • Scuffed sprites
  • Coyote jump system

In next versions i should implement some kind of NPC and attack, then something else.
Controls: AD - Walk left/right, W - Jump

That's all!
